snippet: A Cairo court sentenced Lt. Col. Amr Farouk in the deaths of 37 people who were arrested for protesting against the military takeover.
abstract: Criminal court in Cairo sentences Lt Col Amr Farouk to 10 years in jail for manslaughter in deaths of 37 detainees taking part in August protest of military takeover.
lead_paragraph: A Cairo court sentenced Lt. Col. Amr Farouk in the deaths of 37 people who were arrested for protesting against the military takeover.

headline.main: Egyptian Police Officer Gets 10 Years for Detainees’ Deaths
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Policeman Gets 10 Years in Detainees’ Deaths

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
